library.description: Find Windows services that failed to start. Can indicate misconfigurations or malware interference.
library.spl:
index=windows sourcetype=WinEventLog:System EventCode=7000 OR EventCode=7009 OR EventCode=7011
| stats count by host, EventCode, Message
| sort -count

library.title: Search for Error Messages
library.description: Find events containing "error", "failed", or "denied". A simple way to hunt for problems.
library.spl:
index=* (error OR failed OR failure OR denied OR "access denied" OR "permission denied")
| stats count by sourcetype, host
| sort -count
| head 30

library.title: Most Active Endpoints
library.description: Identify which hosts are generating the most log events. Unusual spikes may indicate issues or attacks.
library.spl:
index=* host=*
| stats count by host
| sort -count
| head 20

library.title: Antivirus and EDR Alerts
library.description: View recent security tool alerts from common AV/EDR solutions. Essential daily review for analysts.
library.spl:
index=* sourcetype IN (symantec*, mcafee*, defender*, crowdstrike*, carbonblack*, sentinelone*)
| search action IN (blocked, quarantined, detected, alert, suspicious)
| stats count by host, signature, action, file_path
| sort -count

library.title: Today's Login Summary
library.description: Quick overview of all successful logins today. Good for daily review and spotting unusual accounts.
library.spl:
index=security sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security EventCode=4624 earliest=-24h
| stats count, dc(dest) as systems_accessed, values(dest) as destinations by user
| sort -count
| head 30

library.title: Recent Password Changes
library.description: Monitor password change and reset events. Unexpected changes may indicate compromise.
library.spl:
index=security sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security (EventCode=4723 OR EventCode=4724)
| eval action=case(EventCode=4723, "Password Change Attempt", EventCode=4724, "Password Reset by Admin")
| stats count by user, action, src_user, dest
| sort -_time

library.title: ES Risk Score Modifications
library.description: Audit who changed risk scores on correlation searches in Enterprise Security. Critical for maintaining RBA integrity.
library.spl:
index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail action=edit_savedsearch
| search info="*risk*" OR savedsearch_name="*Risk*" OR savedsearch_name="*rule*"
| rex field=info "risk_score[^\d]*(?<new_risk_score>\d+)"
| stats count, latest(_time) as last_modified, values(info) as changes by user, savedsearch_name
| eval last_modified=strftime(last_modified, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| sort -last_modified

library.title: Saved Search and Alert Changes
library.description: Track who created, modified, or deleted saved searches and alerts. Essential for change management.
library.spl:
index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail action IN (edit_savedsearch, create_savedsearch, delete_savedsearch)
| eval action_type=case(
    action="create_savedsearch", "Created",
    action="edit_savedsearch", "Modified",
    action="delete_savedsearch", "Deleted")
| stats count by user, savedsearch_name, action_type, _time
| sort -_time
| head 50

library.title: User Role and Capability Changes
library.description: Monitor changes to user roles and capabilities. Detect unauthorized privilege modifications.
library.spl:
index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail (action=edit_user OR action=create_user OR action=edit_roles)
| stats count, values(info) as changes, latest(_time) as last_change by user, action
| eval last_change=strftime(last_change, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| sort -last_change

library.title: Knowledge Object Modifications
library.description: Audit changes to props, transforms, lookups, and other knowledge objects that affect data parsing.
library.spl:
index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail action IN (*props*, *transforms*, *lookup*, *field*, *extract*, *eventtypes*, *tags*)
| stats count, values(action) as actions, latest(_time) as last_change by user, info
| eval last_change=strftime(last_change, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| sort -last_change
| head 50

library.title: App Installation and Changes
library.description: Track app installations, updates, and configuration changes across the Splunk environment.
library.spl:
index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail action IN (install_app, edit_app, *app*)
| stats count, values(action) as actions, latest(_time) as last_change by user, info
| eval last_change=strftime(last_change, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| sort -last_change

library.title: Splunk User Login Activity
library.description: Review who logged into Splunk, when, and from where. Detect unauthorized access attempts.
library.spl:
index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail action=login
| stats count as login_count, earliest(_time) as first_login, latest(_time) as last_login, values(info) as login_info by user
| eval first_login=strftime(first_login, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| eval last_login=strftime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| sort -last_login

library.title: Expensive Search Audit
library.description: Identify users running resource-intensive searches that may impact Splunk performance.
library.spl:
index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail action=search info=completed
| eval scan_count=coalesce(scan_count, 0), event_count=coalesce(event_count, 0), run_time=coalesce(total_run_time, 0)
| where scan_count > 1000000 OR run_time > 300
| stats count as expensive_searches, sum(scan_count) as total_scanned, avg(run_time) as avg_runtime by user
| eval avg_runtime=round(avg_runtime, 2)
| sort -total_scanned

library.title: Dashboard Modifications
library.description: Track who created or modified dashboards. Important for maintaining dashboard integrity.
library.spl:
index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail action IN (*dashboard*, *view*)
| stats count, values(action) as actions, latest(_time) as last_change by user, info
| eval last_change=strftime(last_change, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| sort -last_change
| head 50

library.title: Data Input Configuration Changes
library.description: Monitor changes to data inputs, forwarder configurations, and ingestion settings.
library.spl:
index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail action IN (*input*, *forward*, *receive*, *tcp*, *udp*, *monitor*, *scripted*)
| stats count, values(action) as actions, latest(_time) as last_change by user, info
| eval last_change=strftime(last_change, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| sort -last_change

library.title: REST API Usage Audit
library.description: Track REST API calls to Splunk endpoints. Detect automation and potential API abuse.
library.spl:
index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd_access method IN (POST, PUT, DELETE)
| rex field=uri_path "/services/(?<endpoint>[^/]+)"
| stats count, dc(uri_path) as unique_endpoints, values(method) as methods by user, endpoint, clientip
| where count > 10
| sort -count
